GFRIEND

Introduction

Yuju, born Choi Yu-na, is a South Korean singer-songwriter under AT AREA. She initially trained at LOEN Entertainment but debuted in 2015 under Source Music as the main vocalist of the group GFRIEND. Yuju also released soundtracks for various dramas and her solo digital single "Love Rain" in 2018.

Following GFRIEND's disbandment in May 2021, Yuju left Source Music. On September 1, 2021, it was reported that she joined Konnect Entertainment for her solo career.

Yuju made her solo debut on January 18, 2022, with the extended play Rec. and its lead single "Play."

Yuju decided not to renew her contract with Konnect Entertainment after it expired in mid-April 2024. In late 2024, she became a mentor for the Korean-Taiwanese boy group survival program Scool.

On March 11, 2025, it was announced Yuju signed an exclusive contract with AT AREA.
